cst8284.triviatime

类 QA

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.triviatime.QARequirements
      • cst8284.triviatime.QA
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class QA
extends QARequirements
    This class defines the format of the question/answer in the trivia file.
    从以下版本开始:
    jdk1.8.0_161
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Roger Li
    另请参阅:

    • 构造器详细资料

      • QA

        public QA(java.lang.String question,
          java.lang.String[] answers,
          java.lang.String category,
          java.lang.String explanation,
          int difficulty,
          int points,
          int correctAnswer)
        Creates a new QA instance with given specifications
        参数:
        question - - question extracted from the trivia file
        answers - - answer list extracted from the trivia file
        category - - category info of the extracted question
        explanation - - explanation of extracted question answer
        difficulty - - difficulty info of the extracted question
        points - - points info of the extracted question
        correctAnswer - - the number of potential correct answer
